title: Against the Fate - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Protagonist   Based on a Video Game   Cunning Protagonist   Gods   Male Protagonist   Ninjas   Romantic Subplot   Weak to Strong
author: Writing Shrimp   虾写
description: Haggling, Gambling, Bravery or Outsmarting? How to distinguish which is good and which is evil? Who is the true ruler? On the Eternal Planet, the truth only lies within the hands of the most powerful ones! But the Great Swindling Master will give them a magic show!>
